education.degree: Post-Graduate Program in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Trained object detection models for low latency applications and improved their P/R performance.
Evaluated performance of new OD models. Evaluated OD and segmentation models for automated annotation of field-collected images.
Maintained image datasets, ensured data quality and identified areas of concern to inform future data collections and annotation methods.
Migrated applications to SBC devices and built (Docker + QEMU and native) for target architecture.
Identified and fixed integration issues and bugs in C, C++. Created and maintained scripts to start, monitor and track the health of applications.
Integrated GPS/GNSS receivers and LTE board with embedded devices running Linux, improved the accuracy of location and the robustness of wireless connectivity.
Wrote a Java declarative test framework to ensure accurate event processing by containerized services communicating via a message broker.
Created and maintained Bamboo build pipelines for multiple projects.

experience.title: Software Engineer, SCRUM Master
responsibilities: Implemented CI/CD pipelines to build and deploy microservices, targeting Kubernetes clusters using Jenkins, Helm, Helmfile in a DevOps, Platform-as-Code environment.
Decreased time to discovery of defects and deployment issues by 2 days.
Implemented automated security and compliance scans resulting in higher sprint velocity and lower technical debt.
Led SCRUM activities for a team of senior software engineers for the delivery of a user action capture ETL/ELT data pipeline to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) using containerized microservices.
Managed backlog, stand-ups, sprint planning, sprint review, and retrospective ceremonies in collaboration with the product owner, development, and platform teams.
Reduced stand-up calls duration by 70%.

experience.title: Sr Development Manager
responsibilities: Managed a team of senior engineers in the delivery of Oracle Service Cloud SaaS UI features.
Decreased time to resolutions of defects and service requests age by directly working and triaging customer service requests in collaboration with customer support.
Provisioned and configured Service Cloud instances to create reproducible test cases. Reduced time-to-resolution of customer reported defects by 3+ days.

experience.title: Development Manager
responsibilities: Managed a team of senior engineers in the rewrite, maintenance, and features implementation of a HIPAA-compliant attachment viewer and renderer for My Oracle Support (MOS) internal customer service application.
Interfaced with end-users, integrating applications teams and executive stakeholders to prioritize, plan, and deliver new features.
Introduced Agile SCRUM methodology resulting in shorter delivery cycles of product features.

experience.title: Development Manager, Product Manager
responsibilities: Managed a team of senior engineers in the development, release and maintenance of Oracle E-Business Suite diagnostic tests and diagnostic tools.
